// DO NOT EDIT THIS FILE. This file will be overwritten when re-running go-raml.
package main

import (
	"github.com/gorilla/mux"
	"net/http"
)

// PathInterface is interface for /{path:*} root endpoint
type PathInterface interface { // Get is the handler for GET /{path:*}
	Get(http.ResponseWriter, *http.Request)
}

// PathInterfaceRoutes is routing for /{path:*} root endpoint
func PathInterfaceRoutes(r *mux.Router, i PathInterface) {
	r.HandleFunc("/{path:.*}", i.Get).Methods("GET")
}
